top_comments.comment:
I am disappointed in you derek, you are exaggerating the amount of hardware needed. you keep showing 5 DIFFERENT "GAMEBOYS" as if you need all that to do this. hell at 9:38 you even admit you don't even need ONE GAMEBOY to do this. all you need is the n64, the disk drive, the transfer pack, the gb camera, and the 2 software. honestly i am surprised you didn't have a n64 controller in that image just to inflate the hardware further. 

besides, if you are playing simcity, you would already own the the dd. so unless you want to be ridiculous and go "this is insane, in order to play stardew valley you got to have a keyboard, a mouse, a power supply, a monitor, a motherboard..." otherwise you could just say....

"In order to put your friend into simcity, you need to get the studio software, a gameboy camera, and a transfer pack." never have i been so irked by a punching weight.

@3:29 from what I recall the "perfect head mode" (hehe) was removed because of the recent school shootings in America and Nintendo's concern that people would put unauthorized pictures of others and creating a PR nightmare and tainting Nintendo's kid friendly image.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Oh god, that "nothing as exciting as perfect head" joke... Long live SSFF and long live COMMUNISM !
I miss seeing Producer Grace's gorgeous face, can SSFF feature her a but more? TY

Get N or get out? No. Get N and get an instant like!
9:35 pics of those Japanese people tho! Makes you wonder where they are now
creepy gameboy camera pictures! just in time for halloween

You can actually plug any composite signal into the capture cassette
You could plug another n64, into it.

yeah
